Having added patience to temperance, we are then to ascend the ladder of progress and add to patience godliness. This is the very outgrowth of 


                                    -346- 

patience. Said the apostle Paul, "We glory in tribulations also: knowing that tribulation worketh patience, and patience, experience, and experience, hope: and hope maketh not ashamed; because the love of God is shed abroad in our hearts by the Holy Ghost which is given unto us" (Romans 5:3-5).
